alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 3:19AM MST until November 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, possibly mixing with rain below 7000 feet early Thursday morning. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with higher amounts above 8000 feet. * WHERE...The Mogollon Rim and Black Mesa, including Flagstaff, Williams, Forest Lakes, Heber and Shonto (Black Mesa). * WHEN...From 11 PM Wednesday to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 PM Thursday: Doney Park 2 to 4 inches Flagstaff 4 to 8 inches Forest Lakes 5 to 9 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 2 inches Shonto 1 to 2 inches Williams 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
